participant_abstract.sent: In this meeting the main issues concerning the functional design of the remote control were discussed.
Group members reported on the current trends in the remote control technology including both design as well as technology issues.
Our marketing manager gave us an overview of data reflecting user preferences.
At this meeting the contribution I found most relevant to my role in the project was that of our marketing manager.
Knowing what the trends are in what users expect will ahve a major influence in my making decisions about the interface design issues.

participant_actions.sent: User Interface designer: Final decisions about the buttons we need and an initial design proposal.
Technical designer: Estimate costs of incorporating the newest technology.
Project manager: Plan for the next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: Remote will be used for TV only.
We only incorporate the main function buttons: on/off, channels (both numbers and next/previous) and volume.
Possibly supply a separate beeper button with the remote, to be attached on the TV set to allow to locate the position of the remote easily.
Need to use our company colours and logo in the outer design.

participant_problems.sent: We had some difficulties in projecting the presentations on the wall.
No other major difficulties this time.
